mapper.select: SELECT ct.cartNum, ct.userId, ct.pno, CONCAT(prd.product_name, " (", ct.size, ")") product_name, pfd.storedFileRootName, prd.product_price, ct.productCnt FROM CartDTO ct INNER JOIN ProductDTO prd ON ct.pno = prd.pno INNER JOIN ProductFileDTO pfd ON ct.pno = pfd.pno WHERE ct.userId = #{userId};
